# c-login-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                                                       | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `alt`              | `alt`     | Alt description for logo                                                                          | `string` | `''`        |
| `href`             | `href`    | Login provider link. Do not set if using a click handler like @click in Vue or (click) in Angular | `string` | `''`        |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`     | Login provider logo url                                                                           | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                      | Description             |
| ----------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `--c-login-button-background-color`       | Button background color |
| `--c-login-button-border-color`           | Button border color     |
| `--c-login-button-outline-color`          | Button outline color    |
| `--c-login-button-text-color`             | Button text color       |
| `--c-login-button-title-background-color` | Button title color      |
